SELECT lr.id, lr.`name`, lr.stadium_id, lr.modify_time, lr.create_time, oo.available_seat_count, COUNT( ls.id ) total_seat_count, lsta.`name` stadium_name FROM lib_room lr, lib_seat ls, lib_stadium lsta, ( SELECT ii.room_id, COUNT( DISTINCT id ) available_seat_count FROM ( SELECT ls.room_id room_id, ls.id, CASE WHEN los.`status` IS NULL THEN ls.`status` WHEN ls.`status` = 0 THEN 0 WHEN los.`status` = 1 THEN 1 WHEN los.`status` = 3 THEN 1 WHEN now( ) >= los.end_time THEN 1 WHEN now( ) <= los.start_time THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS `status` FROM lib_seat ls LEFT JOIN lib_order_seat los ON ls.id = los.seat_id ) ii WHERE ii.`status` = 1 GROUP BY ii.room_id ) oo WHERE ls.room_id = lr.id AND oo.room_id = lr.id AND lr.id = ls.room_id AND lsta.id = lr.stadium_id AND ls.`status` = '1'
AND lr.`name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND lsta.`name` like concat('%',#{stadiumName},'%')
AND lr.stadium_id = #{stadiumId}
GROUP BY ls.room_id
